pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, November 30, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

9:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a live virtual interview at the Reuters NEXT conference.

Note for media:

  • Media interested in covering the event can register at: https://events.reutersevents.com/reuters-next-free-virtual-delegate

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
